meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Sally Hatfield Michael Baker Matt Jackson Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #7148.

td.p: Sally Hatfield, an English as a second language instructor originally from Lakeview, Michigan
Michael Baker, a travel media editor from New York, New York
Matt Jackson, a paralegal from Washington, D.C. (whose 13-day cash winnings total $411,612)

tr.td: I WANT CANDY!
NAME THE CAPITAL
RELIGIOUS LEADERS
2-LETTER WORDS THAT BEGIN WITH "A"
MOVIE TAGLINES
(Kelly: The [*] from the Delta Flight Museum--clues about one of the great passenger airplanes of another era.)

div.onmouseout: toggle('clue_J_1_1', 'clue_J_1_1_stuck', 'Invented in 1948, the first dispenser for this candy resembled a lighter, to encourage people to quit smoking')

But, Michael Baker, you are, today, a giant killer, you\'re the new Jeopardy! champion with $15,201. And, Matt Jackson, we\'ll see you in our Tournament of Champions, try to add to your $411,000 in winnings.)

$17,401
the Space Needle (in Seattle)')
